DOC.brief_summary: This protocol is an single patient IND to provide clofazamine to treat one patient who has MAI and is resistant to or can not tolerate standard of care. The drug is not otherwise available.
DOC.brief_title: Clofazamine for the Treatment of Mycobacterium Avium Intracellulare(MAI)
DOC.criteria: Treatment of one patient with MAI No other patients will be treated
